original: 士兵剝去黃蓋的衣服，打了五十脊杖。皮開肉綻，鮮血迸流，昏厥數次。眾官扶起黃蓋，回歸本寨，見者無不動容落淚。
text: The soldier stripped off Huang Gai's clothes and hit fifty spine sticks. The skin was open and the flesh was frayed, the blood rushed, and he fainted several times. The officials lifted up Huang Gai and returned to the village, and they all cried when they saw it.
